text: The 500 Series Shinkansen is a high-speed train in Japan. They run on the Shinkansen lines. They were retired from the primary Nozomi service in 2010. They now run the all-stations Kodama service between Shin-Osaka and Hakata. All 500 Series have 16 cars. Each train cost about 5 billion yen. Only nine were built. ==References== Category:High-speed trains Category:Shinkansen
title: 500 Series Shinkansen
